snippet: WABC-AM is introducing a new lineup on Thursday that emphasizes live and local programming, as its two most popular hosts, Rush Limbaugh and Sean Hannity, move to a rival station, WOR-AM.
abstract: New York talk radio station WABC-AM will introduce new lineup that emphasizes live and local programming; move comes as station's two most popular hosts, Rush Limbaugh and Sean Hannity, move to rival WOR-AM.
lead_paragraph: WABC-AM is introducing a new lineup on Thursday that emphasizes live and local programming, as its two most popular hosts, Rush Limbaugh and Sean Hannity, move to a rival station, WOR-AM.

headline.main: Talk Radio on WABC Shifts Focus to the Local
headline.print_headline: Talk Radio on WABC Shifts to Local
